channel.title: Need Help With Code 565 Delta
channel.description:
the code i want is when the player has tin and copper in their inventory if they use the tin or copper on a furnace they get 1000 smithing exp and 1500 gold
What is the code for what I am trying to do:
When player has item 436 && 438 when player use 436 || 438 on object 3044 give item 995 1500 give exp 13 1000
